casebody.data:
Johnnie ROWE
v.
STATE of North Carolina No. 242P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 7, 2018 Johnnie Rowe, for Rowe, Johnnie. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 6th of August 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Durham County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of August 2018."
